short_summary: The Canadian Federal government will intend to refresh maintenance and repair contracts for the fire hydrants system.
description: This contract is for the refurbishment of the fire hydrant system managed by the Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) department within the federal government. The refurbishment will include the replacement of obsolete systems, and this will be the 1st phase of a refurbishment. This project is expected to cost within the year $21,421,424. The contract will be specifyied in this document by the federal procurement regulation. This will govern how the contract is exploited and what is considered fair competition amongst the maintenance staff assigned.
full_summary:
### Fire Hydrant Removal and Replacement - Prince Albert National Park

#### Request for Proposal

**Reference Number:** CB-6773-21238904

**Solicitation Number:** 5P468-23-0078

**Publication Date:** June 27, 2023

**Closing Date:** July 12, 2023, at 16:00 hours EST

**Expected Contract Start Date:** July 17, 2023

**Expected Contract End Date:** September 30, 2023

**Procurement Type:** Request for Proposal - Competitive

**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Locations:** Saskatchewan, Canada

**Description:**

Parks Canada Agency invites contractors to submit a proposal for the removal of four (4) defective fire hydrants and valves, and the supply and installation of four (4) new fire hydrants and valves within the Townsite of Waskesiu Lake, Saskatchewan, in Prince Albert National Park.

**Specific Requirements:**

* removal of four (4) defective fire hydrants and valves
* supply and installation of four (4) new fire hydrants and valves
* completion of work within the Townsite of Waskesiu Lake, Saskatchewan, in Prince Albert National Park

**Contract Value:** Estimated at $100,001 - $250,000, taxes extra

**Submission Instructions:**

* submission of proposal via email or fax will be accepted
* email should be sent to [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca)
* fax should be sent to 1-855-983-1808
* files should be attached to email and labeled with the solicitation number and project name
* email size should not exceed 15 megabytes

**Inquiry and Information:**

* all inquiries should be submitted in writing to the Authority Contact
* email should be sent to [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca)
* fax should be sent to 1-855-983-1808
* Prequests should be received no later than 5 business days prior to the closing date

**Contract Details:**

* the Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement
* documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada

**Supporting Documents:**

* solicitation documents and addenda can be found on the Government Electronic Tendering
